TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 允许在服务器上对 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access on the server to the HTML element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 控件以编程方式控制 `` 服务器上的 HTML 元素。Use the control to programmatically control the HTML `
` element on the server.这允许您在网页上创建表。This allows you to create a table on a Web page.可以 `
` 通过设置、、、 和 属性，动态更改元素的外观。You can dynamically change the appearance of the `
` element by setting the , , , , and properties. 还可以通过设置 、和属性来控制单元格内容的显示方式 。You can also control how the content of a cell is displayed by setting the , , and properties. 控件的行 存储在控件的属性中 。The rows of the control are stored in the property of the control. 这使您能够以编程方式访问表中的各个行。This allows you to programmatically access the individual rows of the table. > [!NOTE] > 不支持复杂表模型。A complex table model is not supported. 不能将 控件与嵌套的、、、、 `` `` `` `` 或 `` 元素一起使用。You cannot have an control with nested ``, ``, ``, ``, or `` elements.这些元素将被删除，而不会发出警告，并且不会显示在输出 HTML 中。These elements are removed without warning and do not appear in the output HTML.如果尝试以编程方式将这些表模型元素添加到控件的集合，则将引发异常 。An exception will be thrown if you attempt to programmatically add these table model elements to the collection of the control.有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件显示表中的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to display information in a table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何动态创建 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically create an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]
` ``, `

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Table" 文本字符串。The "table" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建控件的新实例 并将其放置在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a new instance of an control and place it on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。

span.span: The alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。Use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不控制控件的单元格中内容的对齐方式 。This property does not control the alignment of the contents in the cells of the control. 若要控制单个单元格的内容对齐方式，请使用 类的和 属性 。To control the alignment of contents of an individual cell, use the and properties of the class. 还可以通过使用类的和属性，控制整行中单元格内容的对齐 方式 。You can also control the alignment of contents of the cells in an entire row by using the and properties of the class. 下表列出了可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|使 控件在网页的左边缘对齐。Aligns the control on the left edge of the Web page.| |`Center`|在网页 中间对齐控件。Aligns the control in the middle of the Web page.| |`Right`|使 控件在网页的右边缘对齐。Aligns the control on the right edge of the Web page.| > [!NOTE] > 如果指定 `Left` 或 `Right` 对齐，则网页上的其他元素将分别换行到控件的右侧或左侧 。If you specify `Left` or `Right` alignment, other elements on the Web page will wrap to the right or left of the control, respectively. 如果指定 `Center` 对齐方式，则不进行换行，并且其他元素显示在控件下方。If you specify `Center` alignment, no wrapping occurs and other elements appear below the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BgColor : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
The background color of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件的背景色 。Use the property to specify the background color of the control. 您可以按名称指定颜色，也可以使用十六进制值（前面带有井号字符） ( # ) ，格式为 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、GG 和 BB 表示0到255之间的十六进制值，分别指示颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色成分。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 #0000FF 表示蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定红色和绿色分量 (00) 的最小值，同时指定蓝色分量 (FF) 的最大值。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六种预定义的 HTML 颜色名称以及可用于属性的相应十六进制值 。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅 [W3C) 网站 (万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |AquaAqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |FuchsiaFuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |NavyNavy|#000080#000080| |橄榄绿Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |RedRed|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |WhiteWhite|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |YellowYellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可从枚举确定用于属性的可用颜色 。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件的背景色 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the background color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的边框宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the border of the control.

value.span: 控件的边框宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of the border of an control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置边框宽度。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that the border width is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定边框的宽度。Use the property to specify the width of the border. 如果不想显示控件的边框 ，请将此属性设置为 0 (没有边框宽度) 或-1 (边框宽度未设置) 。If you do not want to display a border for the control, set this property to either 0 (no border width) or -1 (border width is not set). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件的边框宽度 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
The border color of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件的边框颜色 。Use the property to specify the border color of the control. 您可以按名称指定颜色，也可以使用十六进制值（前面带有井号字符） ( # ) ，格式为 #RRGGBB。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、GG 和 BB 表示0到255之间的十六进制值，分别指示颜色的红色、绿色和蓝色成分。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 #0000FF 表示蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定红色和绿色分量 (00) 的最小值，同时指定蓝色分量 (FF) 的最大值。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六种预定义的 HTML 颜色名称以及可用于属性的相应十六进制值 。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅 [W3C) 网站 (万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |AquaAqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |FuchsiaFuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |NavyNavy|#000080#000080| |橄榄绿Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |RedRed|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |WhiteWhite|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |YellowYellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 可从枚举确定用于属性的可用颜色 。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件的边框颜色 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 控件中单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元宽度;因此，间距适用于列中最宽的单元格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同样，同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 间距应用于行中最高的单元格。The spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制单元格的内容与控件中单元格的边框之间的间距 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing between the contents of the cell and the cell's border in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中相邻单元格之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 控件中相邻单元格之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制控件中各个单元格之间的间距 。Use the property to control the spacing between individual cells in the control. 此间距同时应用于垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式控制控件中单元格的间距 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing of cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 为 控件创建一个新的 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object for the control.

returns.span: 包含 控件的子服务器控件的 。

span.span: A that contains the control's child server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个 用于保存表行的对象。The method creates a object that is used to hold table rows. 方法主要由扩展 控件功能的控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the control.

member this.Height : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.
The height of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制控件的高度 。Use the property to control the height of the control. 高度通常以像素为单位指定。The height is normally specified in pixels. 不过，还可以通过将百分号 (% ) 追加到值来指定浏览器窗口高度的百分比。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window height by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值 `100%` 表示表的高度，即浏览器窗口的高度。For example, the value `100%` indicates a height for the table that is the full height of the browser window. 当用户更改窗口大小时，该表会自动扩展和收缩。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的值小于显示控件内容所需的值 ，则忽略此属性。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式控制控件的高度 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the height of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将 控件的子控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's child controls to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在调用基类的方法之前和之后提供其他格式设置 。The method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's method. 其他格式设置 通过在呈现 控件的子控件之前插入行返回和缩进，使呈现的 HTML 控件更易于读取。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return and indenting before rendering the control's child controls. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便将新的表行追加到 控件上。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a new table row is appended to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildrencs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildrenvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.vb#2)]

summary.span: 呈现 控件的结束标记。

span.span: Renders the control's end tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法在调用基类的方法之后提供其他格式设置 。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 其他格式设置 通过插入结束标记后的行返回，使呈现的 HTML 控件更易于读取 `` 。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return after the closing `
` tag.方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它始终在自定义服务器控件中写入结束标记和新行 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always writes an end tag and a new line in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtagcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtagvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Rows As HtmlTableRowCollection

summary.span: 获取包含 控件中的所有行的 集合。

span.span: Gets an collection that contains all the rows in the control.

value.span: ，它包含 控件中的所有行。

span.span: An that contains all the rows in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 集合以编程方式访问控件中的行 。Use the collection to programmatically access the rows in the control. 您可以通过编程方式将行添加到集合中，也可以在集合中插入行。You can programmatically add rows to, remove rows from, or insert rows into the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `` 控件中未列出任何元素 ， 则返回空对象。If there are no `` elements listed in the control, an empty object is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合以 编程方式向控件添加行 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to programmatically add a row to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Width { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Width : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the control.
The width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制控件的宽度 。Use the property to control the width of the control. 宽度通常以像素为单位指定。The width is normally specified in pixels. 不过，还可以通过将百分号 (% ) 追加到值来指定浏览器窗口宽度的百分比。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window width by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值 `100%` 指示表格宽度为浏览器窗口的宽度。For example, the value `100%` indicates a width for the table that is the full width of the browser window. 当用户更改窗口大小时，该表会自动扩展和收缩。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的值小于显示控件内容所需的值 ，则忽略此属性。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式控制控件的宽度 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]
